title: Sidekiq::RetrySet.new.retry_all problem undefined method `first' for nil:NilClass
body:
We are using 

3.2.1, and rbuy 2.10 

Screenshot
https://www.dropbox.com/s/dhnl3hzs2j0w6gh/Screenshot%202014-07-19%2010.54.53.png
